A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan\, I was a bit underwhelmed by The Last Jedi. The combination of odd\, out-of-place slapstick humor and \"cute Disney magic\" was nothing short of cringeworthy. On top of that\, I found the plot to be choppy and even a bit confusing (even for someone who knows the Star Wars universe inside and out). I couldn't shake the feeling of whiplash as the the plot jerked from one direction to the next\, and introduced new main characters with little to no development. Despite the disappointment\, the last 40 minutes of the movie contained some unforgettable battle scenes along with emotional dialogue that really pulled on the heart strings.
